title: Reinstall but still not loading
body: I reinstalled league and client won't load.

replies.body: It's hard to determine the issue you may be experiencing without more information.  Are there any error messages (and when), screenshots, or further details you might be able to provide?    Using some intuition here, if you had to reinstall and cannot load the patcher, then you may be experiencing a permissions issue.  I'd recommend going over our [Permissions Guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)in case something is preventing your game files from being accessed.
